JDBCUserDataSource - Class in TradingPlatform.JDBCDataSources
The JDBC user datasource is a class used to get a user's details from the database.
JDBCUserDataSource(int, Connection) - Constructor for class TradingPlatform.JDBCDataSources.JDBCUserDataSource
This constructor initialises the JDBC user datasource for a specific user, and the non static methods (such as getUsername) will return the user's details
